name: Spill om en slange
description:
Language: Norwegian.

Use a gamepad if available, otherwise mouse and keyboard works as well, but it feels wrong:)

Gamepad controls:

Left stick: Move character

Right stick: Move camera

South button: Action button

Right trigger: Jump

Menu button: Open menu

Keyboard and mouse controls:

WASD: Move character

Mouse: Move camera

Left click mouse: Action button

Right click mouse: Jump

Escape: Open menu
